message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you.  I'm offering it to you for $15000.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product you're selling, but my budget is limited. Would you consider accepting $12000 for the product?

Bob, I appreciate your offer.  While I'm willing to negotiate, $12000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. How about we meet in the middle at $13500?  This would allow me to make this deal work while still giving you a fair price on a product I believe will be valuable to you.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'd like to propose $13000 as a compromise. This allows us to reach an agreement that respects both our needs.
